short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace the new tab page with one customized to your liking, super modern and minimalist

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Improve and change the appearance of your "New Tab" to a modern and minimalist design.
Completely customizable, choose what you want to appear on your screen, in the language you prefer and choose the background you like the most!

Features:
- See the BTC price live
- Add Clock
- Add local date
- Add Search Bar
- Add Quick acces links
- Add locla weather
- Inspirational Quotes
- Switch language (English and Spanish)
- Dark Mode

And more features comming soon!

New updates every Week!!
